```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(demopkg)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
self_res_att |>
  group_by(sex, ethgroup) |>
  summarise(n = n(),
            mean_age = mean(age) |> round(1),
            sd_age = sd(age) |> round(2),
            .groups = "drop")
```
